languages.text: "По делу. В Пустотном братстве есть традиция — не отпускать {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}друзей{/d} в дальний и опасный поход без даров. Припасы уже загружают на корабль, а это... Это — от старой Риззы лично".

"Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."
languages.original_text: "По делу. В Пустотном братстве есть традиция — не отпускать {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}друзей{/d} в дальний и опасный поход без даров. Припасы уже загружают на корабль, а это... Это — от старой Риззы лично".

traits.locale_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “是谈生意的。根据我们虚空协联的规矩，{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}好朋友{/d}踏上远征的时候，不把礼物装得满满的是绝对不行的。咱们聊天这会儿，那些补给品已经装到你的船上了。还有这个……这个是老莱萨送给你的私人礼物。”
languages.original_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."

traits.locale_text: “是谈生意的。根据我们虚空协联的习俗，好朋友踏上远征的时候，不把礼物装得满满的是绝对不行的。咱们聊天这会儿，那些补给品已经装到你的船上了。还有这个……这个是老莱萨送给你的私人礼物。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「商売。{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}友人{/d}を危険な長旅に送り出す際に贈り物をするのは、虚空の仲間の習わしです。今喋っている間にも、物資があなたの船に積まれていますよ。最後にこれは…リザからの個人的な贈り物です」
languages.original_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."

traits.locale_text: 「商売。{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}友人{/d}を危険な長旅に送り出す際に贈り物をするのは、虚空の仲間の習わしです。今喋っている間にも、物資があなたの船に積まれていますよ。最後にこれは…リザからの個人的な贈り物です」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Negocios. Es costumbre entre la Hermandad del Vacío decirle adiós a un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}gran amig{mf|o|a}{/d} que parte en una expedición larga y peligrosa con regalos. Están cargando los suministros en su nave ahora mismo, y esto... Esto es de parte de la vieja Ryzza».
languages.original_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."

traits.locale_text: «Negocios. Es costumbre entre la Hermandad del Vacío decirle adiós a un{mf||a} gran amig{mf|o|a} que parte en una expedición larga y peligrosa con regalos. Están cargando los suministros en su nave ahora mismo, y esto... Esto es de parte de la vieja Ryzza».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Rein geschäftlich. Bei den Gefährten der Leere ist es Brauch, einen {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}Freund{/d} nicht ohne Abschiedsgeschenke zu einer langen und gefährlichen Expedition aufbrechen zu lassen. Die Vorräte werden just in diesem Moment auf Euer Schiff gebracht, und das ... Das ist von der alten Ryzza persönlich."
languages.original_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."

traits.locale_text: "Rein geschäftlich. Bei den Gefährten der Leere ist es Brauch, einen Freund nicht ohne Abschiedsgeschenke zu einer langen und gefährlichen Expedition aufbrechen zu lassen. Die Vorräte werden just in diesem Moment auf Euer Schiff gebracht, und das ... Das ist von der alten Ryzza persönlich."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Je suis là pour affaires. La Communauté du vide a pour habitude d'offrir des présents à ceux de ses {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}amis{/d} qui partent pour de longues et périlleuses expéditions. Du matériel est en train d'être chargé à bord de votre vaisseau en ce moment même. Quant à ceci... C'est un cadeau de ma part. »
languages.original_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis là pour affaires. La Communauté du vide a pour habitude d'offrir des présents à ceux de ses amis qui partent pour de longues et périlleuses expéditions. Du matériel est en train d'être chargé à bord de votre vaisseau en ce moment même. Quant à ceci... C'est un cadeau de ma part. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "İş. Geleneğimizdir, Uçsuz Kardeşliği bir {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}dostunu{/d} uzun ve tehlikeli bir keşif seferine armağansız yollamaz. Biz şu an konuşurken erzaklar gemine yükleniyor. Bu da... Koca Ryzza'dan kişisel bir armağan."
languages.original_text: "Business. It's a custom among the Fellowship of the Void never to see a {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}friend{/d} off on a long and dangerous expedition without gifts. The supplies are being loaded to your ship as we speak, and this... this is from old Ryzza personally."

traits.locale_text: "İş. Geleneğimizdir, Uçsuz Kardeşliği bir {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}dostunu{/d} uzun ve tehlikeli bir keşif seferine armağansız yollamaz. Biz şu an konuşurken erzaklar gemine yükleniyor. Bu da... Koca Ryzza'dan kişisel bir armağan."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
